name: Super Roll 65
description:
Super Roll! Party race with up to 7 other monkeys to see who can really roll!

*IMPORTANT: For the smoothest game play experience,  download the Windows  Desktop version "v1.02c" of the game. Windows will give you a scary blue pop up where you have to click "More info" to boot the game. The browser version of the game may experience some playback issues, and the desktop version SHOULD run faster.

**Updated port from v1.02 of the Super Roll cart. If you have questions on playback please check the forum.

Game by : @slumberface  &  @portdrift
